definition: down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action

sentences.english: Objective To investigate a new method of genioplasty for treatment of a prominent mandibular angle with mandibular malformation.
sentences.chinese: 目的探索治疗下颌角肥大伴颏畸形时隆颏的新方法。

sentences.english: Zheng Tao was later taken to a local hospital with a jaw injury.
sentences.chinese: 随后张涛因下颌受伤而被送进了医院。

sentences.english: Patients retaining mandible or with skin flap repair had higher quality of life than the others.
sentences.chinese: 行下颌骨保留或皮瓣修复患者较同类病例生存质量高。

sentences.english: The anesthesia effect in maxillary teeth was better than that in mandibular teeth.
sentences.chinese: 上颌牙的麻醉效果好于下颌牙。

sentences.english: Objective Summing up the trentmeat experience of mandible fracture.
sentences.chinese: 目的总结下颌骨骨折的治疗经验。

sentences.english: Pressure should be applied to bleeding sites such as a de-gloving scalp wound.
sentences.chinese: 应该对下颌部头皮伤的出血部位进行加压。

sentences.english: Total Airway Obstruction After Maxillomandibular Advancement Surgery for Obstructive Sleep Apnea.
sentences.chinese: 患者在上下颌徙前术后发生全气道梗阻。

sentences.english: He was knocked out cold and thought his jaw was broken.
sentences.chinese: 他被打昏了，而且以为自己的下颌被打断了。

sentences.english: He downed his opponent with a quick right to the jaw.
sentences.chinese: 他迅速准确击中对手的下颌而把他击倒。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the methods and experience of radical therapy of central arteriovenous malformation of the jaw.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨下颌骨动静脉畸形的根治性治疗方法和经验。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the procedure and effect on treating septic arthritis of temporomandibular joint (TMJ).
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨化脓性颞下颌关节炎的治疗方法及其疗效。

sentences.english: Influence of inserting occlusal splints on the position of mandibular condyle.
sentences.chinese: 咬合板高度对下颌髁突位置的影响。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the effect of using partially demineralized allogenic bone for the repair of bone defects.
sentences.chinese: 研究异体部分脱矿骨在修复下颌骨缺损中的作用。

sentences.english: An Applied Anatomical study on the marginal mandibular Branch of facial nerve.
sentences.chinese: 面神经下颌缘支的应用解剖学研究。

sentences.english: This can cause lower jaw pains as well as muscle pains in the back of the head.
sentences.chinese: 这会引发下颌痛和后脑勺肌肉痛。

sentences.english: Objective To detect the prominence of the use of pure titanium plate of internal immobilization in treating mandibular bone fractures.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨钛板内固定在治疗下颌骨骨折中的优异性。
